data.description: Adaptation Ebay Backend for the U.K.site
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The Ebay.pm module by Martin Thurn exclusively searches the US
    (ebay.com) site. This is an adaptation to search the UK (ebay.co.uk)
    site. I've followed his naming convention and attributed as much of
    the hard work to him as possible.

    The only extra funcitionality is the "results->raw()" call, which
    is new to this backend, it merely serves up raw HTML. Which is only
    moderately useful, but I may change this in the future.
